description.raw:
This PR makes sure to also remove all stray visualization visuals when their parents are deleted. Thanks to @chapulina for the tests.

I also added a `VisualType` enum to `Visual`. This is convenient to distinguish between gui visuals, sensor isualizations, etc with entity visuals such as model and link visuals.

On fixing visual removal, I encountered a problem where the Event system tries to invoke member functions of deleted visual instances. This is mainly due to the fact that the visual is deleted before being removed from the event connections (which happens in the next `Signal` call) . A fix has been in place for this.
description.html:
This PR makes sure to also remove all stray visualization visuals when their parents are deleted. Thanks to @chapulina for the tests.

I also added a VisualType enum to Visual. This is convenient to distinguish between gui visuals, sensor isualizations, etc with entity visuals such as model and link visuals.

On fixing visual removal, I encountered a problem where the Event system tries to invoke member functions of deleted visual instances. This is mainly due to the fact that the visual is deleted before being removed from the event connections (which happens in the next Signal call) . A fix has been in place for this.

title.raw: Clean up Visuals on removal and add Visual Type
